https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eABsBr5TnW8FBSSSsAKFnwDW1BW.jpg A behind-the-scenes documentary about the recording of Aretha Franklin's best-selling album finally sees the light of day more than four decades after the original footage was shot. Amazing Grace
